page.title: 20Social Concerns in Langho 2
page.content: The rehabilitation of patients from nearby mental hospitals is a local concern . Calderstones in nearby Whalley , for many years home to hundreds of adult mental patients , is now attempting to rehabilitate many inmates and is meeting some resistance in the area . Again lack of real knowledge of mental illness and how to cope with it is probably a root cause of this resistance . General concern about a lack of community spirit has given rise to an association intent upon providing a community centre for the area . The W.I. who have undertaken this project put the fostering of this community spirit very high on their list of priorities .
